file_content.text: I see where the Republic's loyalties lie. I'll factor that into my prices the next time you come to purchase my goods.
With the resources your people are saving, I can afford to extend a discount to the Republic on future purchases.
I appreciate your decision. My corporation is in your debt.
You must be General Var Suthra's Jedi friend. He speaks highly of you.
The Empire is stripping Corellia of its wealth. It's disgusting.
Your forces successfully liberated my company headquarters. Unfortunately, the Empire discovered my cache of precious resources and escaped with a sizable portion.
Nevertheless, a bargain is a bargain. Please accept this reward with my esteemed thanks. Farewell.
